alert.note: Alert for Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 23 at 5:04AM EDT until March 23 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 404 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Santa Rosa Beach, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Santa Rosa Beach around 425 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Portland, Port Washington, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Rock Hill, Miramar Beach, Bruce, Gulf Pines, New Home and Freeport. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
